com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.ui
Class SimpleMessageDialog

java.lang.Object
  com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.ui.SimpleMessageDialog
public class SimpleMessageDialog
extends java.lang.Object

Simple class to provide simplier access to javax.swing.JOptionPane and its ability to give simple dialogs. See, simple.

Author:
Giuseppe_Gennaro
